text: Karl Laas (17 April 1908 - 28 December 1967) was an Estonian long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Tartu Category:People from the Governorate of Livonia Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Estonian male long- distance runners Category:Estonian male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Estonia
title: Karl Laas
